about_the_game:
EasyCrea is a 3D creation software made by Lexip. Thought for beginners, learn the basics of modelization thanks to intuitive tutorials (from 10 years old).

Assemble simple and complex shapes to create your piece of art. You can also import shapes or export your projects in STL or OBJ format in order to print them if you have a 3D printer.

Progress while having fun with tens of achievements for those who like to take on the challenges !

This software is made for all the family, everyone can have its own session (customizable with a profile picture), and so its own progression.

EasyCrea is a free software.
